jsbook.title: JavaScript Book
jsbook.subtitle: A comprehensive resource covering JavaScript from basics to advanced topics.
jsbook.aboutText: This JavaScript Book covers everything from basic syntax to DOM manipulation, events, functional programming, and asynchronous patterns, giving you practical skills for real-world development.
jsbook.aboutText1: Left side sidebar allows you to select topics you want to learn. Each topic is explained with practical code examples.
jsbook.coverageText: - Covers a wide range of topics from basics to advanced
jsbook.clearExplanationsText: - Breaks down complex concepts into clear explanations
jsbook.bestPracticesText: - Introduces industry-standard coding styles and patterns
jsbook.getStartedText: Select 'JavaScript Basics' from the left sidebar to start or click on any topic that interests you.
jsbook.notFoundMessage: Sorry, the topic you are looking for could not be found.
